page.title: 07A MECHANIC'S WORKING DAY
page.content: The mechanic we visited worked at Wyton Garage. He starts work at the garage at 8.30a.m. His favourite job is mending cars that have been in an accident and re-spraying them with paint. The mechanic travels to work in his own car and sometimes while he is at work he drives the garage's big pick up truck. He wears a pair of overalls whenever he works in the garage. He has been working at Wyton Garage for 20 years and he has all the tools and equipment he needs to enjoy his job. At Wyton Garage they only work on cars but he remembers repairing some very expensive ones, like Mercedes and Jaguar. The mechanic finishes work at 5.15p.m. and that is the end of his working day.
